about_the_game:
-------------------
2024/4/10
**Major update! **

The following images have been created as an update.
Walking and facial graphics for all monsters that were not included.
Modified about 2/3 of the monster images in the "enemies" folder to optimize them for the front view.
Revised "DotFont" in the "omake" folder by adding some symbols (mainly for English-speaking people).

-------------------

■Retro graphic materials focusing on the colors of certain famous home-use 8-bit game consoles of the past.

We have taken into consideration both the "look" and the "restrictions of those 8-bit home video game consoles" to satisfy everyone from those who "want a somewhat retro look" to those who "want to make it look exactly like the coloring of those consoles.

■Vast amount of materials

This is the only graphic package that can be used for all your graphic needs.
(All the graphics are included in the project except for "parallaxes" and "pictures" in the "img" folder.)

■Sample projects included to make your work easier

We have also prepared a sample project with some database already created.
Since there are no map events, you can use this to concentrate on creating events from scratch.

■Includes extras

Retro self-made fonts "DotFont.ttf" and "DotFontBold.ttf" with Hiragana Katakana, alphanumeric characters and some symbols are also included.

Contents
STRICT folder (for those who want to get closer to the 8-bit home video game consoles.)

Characters: 115 walking characters
face:115 types
sv_actors: 32 types
window: 2 types of window materials

img folder (not including different colors)

animations: about 90 types
battlebacks1,2:more than 100 types
Characters: (115 walking characters, 24 vehicles, about 30 gates and doors, and various other objects such as treasure chests)
enemies,sv_enemies:more than 100 kinds
Faces: 115 types
sv_actors: 32 types
system: Same materials as the default, 11 types of Window
tilesets: Includes many tiles for fields, exteriors, interiors, dungeons, and vehicles.
titles1: 30 types
titles2: 9 titles


plugins folder (for correct display of battle backgrounds)

FC_AjustTerrainMV,MZ.js
FC_DontTrimMV,MZ.js


withoutPlugins folder

Combat background materials that are required if the above plug-ins are not used.

project folder

Contains sample projects for which a database has been created to some extent. (Two versions, Japanese and English)


Other Folders

Two retro fonts (DotFont.ttf, DotFontBold.ttf)


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
detailed_description:
-------------------
2024/4/10
**Major update! **

The following images have been created as an update.
Walking and facial graphics for all monsters that were not included.
Modified about 2/3 of the monster images in the "enemies" folder to optimize them for the front view.
Revised "DotFont" in the "omake" folder by adding some symbols (mainly for English-speaking people).

-------------------

■Retro graphic materials focusing on the colors of certain famous home-use 8-bit game consoles of the past.

We have taken into consideration both the "look" and the "restrictions of those 8-bit home video game consoles" to satisfy everyone from those who "want a somewhat retro look" to those who "want to make it look exactly like the coloring of those consoles.

We have also prepared a sample project with some database already created.
